entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM PST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 05:57 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
